text.raw: {"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-1","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Our Story","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"blockquote","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Our team was formed in February 2020 when Niels Tangherlini, EMS Operations Chief with the SFFD, reached out to Code for SF to help solve a problem he’d encountered for many years: how to help ambulances direct non-critical patients to EDs with the most availability.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Since then, we’ve worked closely with the SFFD, as well as nurses, administrators, and IT departments from local hospitals to develop a working prototype of the platform.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Today, we’re preparing to beta test the tool in the city of San Francisco.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-1","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Problem","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"EMT and ER wait times have increased significantly over the years —\r compromising the care and lives of patients.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-1","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"User Guides","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Follow the step-by-step instructions below to get started with Routed.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-1","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Support","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Thank you for using Routed!","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Your feedback is important to us. If this is an emergency, please notify your direct report. ","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Routed helps emergency medical personnel offer better patient care.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-1","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Meet the team","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Our all-volunteer team includes software engineers, data analysts, full-stack developers, and designers ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"— ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"text","value":"with experience in patient health care records, hospitality, government services, and logistics.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"Routed brings the communication pipeline between EMTs and emergency staff\r into the 21st century, providing in-bound transports with access to optimal care options and hospitals with better patient data to prepare them ahead of arrival.","nodeType":"text"}],"nodeType":"paragraph"}],"nodeType":"document"}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-1","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Mission","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Routed disrupts the current model for communication between EMTs and emergency departments, adopting innovative real-time technology for more efficient and effective care.","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}

{"nodeType":"document","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"heading-1","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Our real-time roadmap to optimal patient care.","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"heading-3","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"Email us at ","marks":[],"data":{}},{"nodeType":"hyperlink","data":{"uri":"mailto:contact@routedapp.org"},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"contact@routedapp.org","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"text","value":".","marks":[],"data":{}}]},{"nodeType":"paragraph","data":{},"content":[{"nodeType":"text","value":"","marks":[],"data":{}}]}]}
